name: Alec Bradley - Royal Oak Sun Grown - Robusto
brand: Alec Bradley, Royal Oak Sun Grown
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Royal Oak Sungrown is a Nicaraguan puro that sports a dark, sweet Maduro wrapper. The Royal Oak Sungrown produces an invigorating, full-bodied smoking sensation that is well-balanced with subtle nuances and will complement your favorite wine. Hand crafted by Alec Bradley, the Royal Oak Sungrown was created exclusively for Total Wine & More, which is considered one the largest independent retailers of fine wine in the country.
